description:
The Warriors of Chaos come to Warhammer: The Old World and the forces of the Mechanicum fight over Mars in Warhammer: The Horus Heresy. Get a full look at next week's pre-orders: https://ow.ly/mXMk50T51tp

title: This Week in Warhammer – From the North They Come

description:
Today we’re showing you how to paint Astorath the Grim ready for the battlefield – mind your head!

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Black Legion

Base:
Iron Hands Steel
Kantor Blue 
Khorne Red
Mephiston Red 
Retributor Armour
Rhinox Hide 
Zandri Dust

Layer:
Administratum Grey
Fulgurite Copper 
Pallid Wych Flesh
Word Bearers Red

Shade:
Targor Rageshade

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

title: How to Paint: Astorath the Grim | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000
